alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 3:23PM CDT until April 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WISE...SOUTHEASTERN JACK...PARKER AND NORTHEASTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brock, or 9 miles southeast of Mineral Wells, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Azle, Briar, Willow Park, Reno, Aledo, Springtown, Brock, Hudson Oaks, Annetta, Graford, Poolville, Paradise, Cool, Lake Mineral Wells, Lake Weatherford, Annetta North, Millsap and Perrin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
